author: Staff Reporter
text:
As per the Election Commission instruction, GPS (Global Positioning System) was installed in all the 18 vehicles allotted to flying squads, static surveillance teams and video surveillance teams in the district here on Wednesday.

Officials said that the GPS would help in tracking of vehicles through the control room established at the collectorate.

Earlier, in the day District Election Officer and Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy held a meeting with the media persons.

He informed them about the model code of conduct and also continuous monitoring of all televisions and social media.

He also said that advertisements of all political parities would be monitored in the control room.
title: GPS installed in election squad vehicles
